name: Binaryoptionsscams
short_description:
Instead of purchasing the asset itself, investor can speculate on the direction they estimate an asset to move in. When a binary option is purchased on a platform, a contract is created which gives an investor the right to buy an underlying asset at a fixed price, within a specified time frame. It may look something like this; an investor purchases a Microsoft binary option for $10, with the opinion that at the end of day Microsoft’s shares will be higher than they currently stand. 
MOST POPULAR BEGINNERS TIPS
Don’t be so much excited, especially by high bonus; Bonuses are used to leverage the initial budget, but they don’t come for free. When you receive a bonus, it doesn’t mean that you could just trade once or twice then withdraw all your cash plus bonus .To be able to claim the bonus, one has to perform a number of minimum trades in the volume of the bonus. go to www.binaryoptionsthatsucks.com and learn more!
summary: A binary option trading is a new type of investment .
